questions: I want to give a statement about some incidents that happened
The incident is robbery with violence at my house
answers: When was it and did you see the suspects?

questions: The incident is for disturbing neighbors
They are always having parties every single day with loud music
answers: Where is your place of residence?
Great, we will send a team to look into that matter. Thank you for reporting

questions: Yes I saw the suspects, it was on 30th August this year
answers: Give a description of the suspects

questions: They were two, one wore black t-shirt and kaki pants and the other wore red hoody with blue jeans. They had guns
answers: Great! We will do our investigation then we will reach out when we have something
